name: Abu_ser
description: Abu is the Modified Version of WhatsAsena, Made By @Afx-Abu with Baileys.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 91xxxxxxxxx,0

NUMBER.description: If you want to add  owner number to your git contact, enter the number here, and be careful not to use + and space when entering the number. Example: 91xxxxxxxxx

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

WELCOME.description: You can select welcome as gif/pp

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

AUTO_BÄ°O.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

PM_BLOCK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

FULL_EVA.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

ABU_AI.description: turn on chat back auto reply Abu (use true to on and fale to off)

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by pinky bot

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

BGM_DURATION.description: FUNY BGM DURATION  codded by (hunk!nd3 p4d4y41!

WORK_TYPE.description: Abu Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

ALIVEBUTTON.description: Set the alive message two name

ALIVE_BUTTON.description: Set the Alive message first name

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

SONGD.description: Customizable song DOWNLOADING message instead of 'Dowloading your song'

SONGU.description: Customizable song UPLOADING message instead of 'Uploading your song'

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.
